content: CP 767 Speed strip (mineral wool) ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Ready to use joints and cavity barriers- ### FEATURES:Features Up to 60% faster than castle cutting Smooth surface provides cost effective spray coverage Pre-cut, leaves no gaps or voids For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Dispenser Category: N/A Technical Data | Dispenser Category | N/A ### ITEMS- 374506 - Speed strips CP 767 (2 hr) 36 x 1.25 x 4 - Package Size 21 pc - 374508 - Speed strips CP 767 (2 hr) 36 x 1.25 x 2 - Package Size 42 pc - 374505 - Speed strips CP 767 (1 hr) 36 x 0.625 x 4 - Package Size 42 pc - 374507 - Speed strips CP 767 (1 hr) 36 x 0.625 x 2 - Package Size 84 pc
